clauses.title: This service reserves the right to edit any content you post
clauses.description: This service can edit any content on the service for whatever the reason and at their sole discretion.
clauses.clause_text: En virtud de esta cesión, Eltiempo.es podrá, con carácter enunciativo y no limitativo, adaptar, corregir, modificar, mantener, obtener nuevas versiones y otras obras derivadas sobre los citados contenidos.

case.text: Content you post may be edited by the service for any reason

clauses.title: Tracking via third-party cookies for advertising
clauses.description: The service's website sets third-party cookies (cookies that do not belong to their domain) for purposes not including statistics and analytics.
clauses.clause_text:
COOKIES DE PERSONALIZACIÓN DE PUBLICIDAD

  • Estas cookies obtienen información de la navegación del usuario para gestionar espacios publicitarios y ofrecer un contenido publicitario más relevante y de calidad a partir de sus intereses y características como el idioma, el tipo de navegador a través del cual accede al servicio, la configuración regional desde donde accede al servicio, etc.

case.text: Third-party cookies are used for advertising

clauses.title: Terms may be changed any time at their discretion, without notice to the user
clauses.description: The Agreements can be updated at any time, including in a way that negatively affects user rights, without notifying before or after the changes.
clauses.clause_text: Eltiempo.es podrá modificar en cualquier momento las condiciones aquí determinadas, siendo debidamente publicadas como aquí aparecen. La vigencia de las citadas condiciones irá en función de su exposición y estarán vigentes hasta que sean modificadas por otras debidamente publicadas.

case.text: Terms may be changed any time at their discretion, without notice to you

clauses.title: This service reserves the right to disclose your personal information without notifying you
clauses.description: If the Government governing the Terms requests personal data of a user of this service, they may not inform/notify the user while complying with the request.
clauses.clause_text:
3. To other parties to comply with our legal requirements In order to comply with any legal obligation, and in order to enforce or apply our terms of use and other agreements.
To protect the rights, property, or safety of Pelmorex, our customers, or others

case.text: Your personal data may be disclosed to comply with government requests without notice to you

clauses.title: This service can license user content to third parties
clauses.description: By posting content through the Services, users grant them a transferable and/or sublicensable right, which allows user content to be licensed to third parties.
clauses.clause_text:
En caso de que el Usuario publique fotografías o cualquier otro contenido a través del canal habilitado para ello en el Portal, el Usuario cede a Eltiempo.es y a las empresas del grupo Pelmorex Corp., los derechos de explotación de uso, reproducción, distribución, comunicación pública y transformación sobre todos los contenidos originales que desarrolle y facilite a Eltiempo.es.

Todas estas cesiones se producen de forma gratuita, incluida la facultad de transferirlos, a su vez, total o parcialmente a terceros.

case.text: Your content can be licensed to third parties

clauses.title: The service can sell or otherwise transfer your personal data as part of a bankruptcy proceeding or other type of financial transaction.
clauses.description: If the service gets acquired or is involved in a merger, bankruptcy, reorganisation or sale, your personal data may be transferred or sold.
clauses.clause_text:
2.
To companies we may buy or who may buy us.
We may disclose your personal data to a prospective or actual buyer of us, or a prospective or actual seller of their company to us.

case.text: Your personal data may be sold or otherwise transferred as part of a bankruptcy proceeding or other type of financial transaction

clauses.title: The service may use tracking pixels, web beacons, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting on users.
clauses.description: Tracking technologies (such as web beacons, tracking pixels...) are employed on users and/or the service assigns a unique ID to a browser or device to track its behaviour.
clauses.clause_text: With respect to web cookies and similar technologies (browser cache, unique identifiers (ie: mobile phone IDs), web beacons, or pixels), we seek consent from users of our Services in the EEA based on a separate Cookies Policy.

case.text: You are tracked via web beacons, tracking pixels, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting

AdSense.
Google Analytics Advertiser Features.
AdExchange, Amazon, Criteo, Index Exchange, Open X, Tapad and App Nexus.

case.text: Many third parties are involved in operating the service

clauses.title: This service gives your personal data to third parties involved in its operation
clauses.description: Your personal data is or may be given to third parties essential to the service’s operation. This could be an external spam detection service for an internet forum.
clauses.clause_text:
1.
Business partners, suppliers, contractors and other processors So that such processors may assist us in the operation, provision and enhancement of our Services.

case.text: This service gives your personal data to third parties involved in its operation

clauses.title: The service uses your personal data for advertising
clauses.description: Your interaction with the service and data you have shared with them may be gathered to create an advertising ID or profile to target ads on you, either on the website you were visiting or in third party websites.
clauses.clause_text: "We may use your personal data in the following ways: [...] To measure or understand the effectiveness of advertising we serve to you and others, and to deliver relevant advertising to you."

case.text: Your personal data is used for advertising

clauses.title: Any liability on behalf of the service is only limited to the fees you paid as a user
clauses.clause_text: En cualquier caso, la eventual responsabilidad de Eltiempo.es frente al Usuario por todos los conceptos quedará limitada como máximo al importe de las cantidades percibidas directamente del Usuario por Eltiempo.es, con exclusión en todo caso de responsabilidad por daños indirectos o por lucro cesante.

clauses.title: Third-party cookies are used for statistics
clauses.description: For instance, Google Analytics, rather than self-hosted (first-party) statistics software.
clauses.clause_text: Google Analytics For the computational analysis of statistics.

case.text: Third-party cookies are used for statistics

clauses.title: Tracking pixels are used in service-to-user communication
clauses.description: The service tracks the user count or some actions of the user; this is usually used for statistics. For example, emails sent by a service can contain a pixel tag, which is a small, clear image that can tell them whether or not you have opened an email and what your IP address is.
clauses.clause_text: This quote doesn't clearly specify whether they use those pixels in their e-mails or only on the website, though.

case.text: Tracking pixels are used in service-to-user communication

clauses.title: You can limit how your information is used by third-parties and the service
clauses.description: Usually it's related to the right to object to data processing or restrict it under the GDPR. Users may be able to refuse the use of their data for marketing purposes for instance.
clauses.clause_text: and a right to request that we restrict the processing of the personal data.

case.text: You can limit how your information is used by third-parties and the service

clauses.title: You can request access, correction and/or deletion of your data
clauses.description: Users have the right to access personal data hold by the Service, correct it and/or permanently delete it. This usually applies to Services GDPR compliants.
clauses.clause_text: The EU GDPR provides you with a right to request access to the personal data we have collected from you, a right to request rectification of the data or that the data be erased,

case.text: You can request access, correction and/or deletion of your data

clauses.title: Tracking cookies refused will not limit your ability to use the service
clauses.description: Blocking tracking technologies will not negatively impact your use of the service.
clauses.clause_text:
You can continue to use our Services without consenting to the use of cookies that are not strictly necessary.
the only consequence is that our Services will be less customized.

case.text: Tracking cookies refused will not limit your ability to use the service

clauses.title: The service's data retention period is kept to the minimum necessary for fulfilling its purposes
clauses.description: The service will remove personal data from its systems once it is no longer required. Depending on the type of information and the reason it was collected, data retention periods will vary.
clauses.clause_text:
How Long We Keep Your Personal Data

Your data is stored with Pelmorex for as long as we are required to keep it in order to provide our Services to you in a seamless fashion or in compliance with applicable law.

case.text: The data retention period is kept to the minimum necessary for fulfilling its purposes

clauses.title: You maintain ownership of your content
clauses.description: This service does not claim ownership over user-generated content or materials, and the user doesn't need to waive any moral rights by posting owned content.

case.text: You maintain ownership of your content

clauses.title: Your personal data will not be used for an automated decision-making
clauses.description: The service promises not to use your personal data for automated decision-making, including profiling.
clauses.clause_text:
We do not use automated decision-making, including profiling, as referred to in Article 22(1) of the EU GDPR.
that is, in a way that produces legal effects concerning you or significantly affects you.

case.text: Your personal data will not be used for an automated decision-making

clauses.title: A complaint mechanism is provided for the handling of personal data
clauses.description: The service provides users with contact information for an internal or external structure to lodge complaints. It also provides users with contact information for a higher data protection / privacy office in case the internal mechanism fails to satisfy the user.
clauses.clause_text:
You have the right to lodge a complaint with a supervisory authority.

You can exercise any of these rights by contacting us at infoprivacy@pelmorex.com

case.text: A complaint mechanism is provided for the handling of personal data
